alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 1:44AM MST until December 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches in the mountains, with 3 to 8 inches for Pinedale and Daniel. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph in the mountains. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West, Salt River and Wyoming Ranges and Upper Green River Basin Foothills. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to 11 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Wind River Mountains West
